mdRecord.dcterms:title: Criminal Warrants, Justice of the Peace: Commonwealth vs Thomas Childress
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Commonwealth vs Thomas Childress Offense: Felony Theft of bank notes belonging to J.F. Martin Victim and Complainant: J.F. Martin Recorded in Floyd County Courthouse 03.14.1887 Costs: $200.Thomas Childress surety to appear at Floyd Court on March 17, 1887 $200. Jube McCormick Surety Court costs $2.25
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
Warrants (Law)
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
